name: autopickup-platform
description: 虚拟产品自动提货平台

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && serve -s build" "cd admin-panel && serve -s build"
